mapper.update:
UPDATE `container_info` SET
`deploy_id` = #{set.deployId},
`container_id` = #{set.containerId},
`container_name` = #{set.containerName},
`image_name` = #{set.imageName},
`image_tag` = #{set.imageTag},
`image_id` = #{set.imageId},
`command` = #{set.command},
`container_create_time` = #{set.containerCreateTime},
`container_ports` = #{set.containerPorts},
`state` = #{set.state},
`status` = #{set.status},
`network_mode` = #{set.networkMode},
`is_valid` = #{set.isValid},
`is_delete` = #{set.isDelete},
`create_time` = #{set.createTime},
`create_user` = #{set.createUser},
`update_time` = #{set.updateTime},
`update_user` = #{set.updateUser},
`id` in
#{item}
and
`id` >= #{where.idSt} and
`id` <= #{where.idEd} and
`deploy_id` in
#{item}
and
`deploy_id` >= #{where.deployIdSt} and
`deploy_id` <= #{where.deployIdEd} and
`container_id` in
#{item}
and
(
`Container_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Container_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`container_name` in
#{item}
and
(
`Container_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Container_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

#{item}
and
(

) and
(
`Image_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`image_tag` in
#{item}
and
(

) and
(
`Image_tag` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`image_id` in
#{item}

(

) and
`command` in

) and

SELECT c.`deploy_id`,c.`container_id`,c.`container_name`,c.`image_name`,c.`image_tag`,c.`image_id`,c.`command`,c.`container_create_time`, c.`container_ports`,c.`state`,c.`status`,c.`network_mode`,p.`deploy_mode`,p.`host_ip`,p.`docker_env`,pro.`project_name`,pro.`project_group` FROM `container_info` c LEFT JOIN `project_deploy_info` p ON c.`deploy_id` = p.`id` LEFT JOIN `project_mgr` pro ON p.`project_id` = pro.`project_id`
